pullRequest.title: Fix tests failing on windows
pullRequest.bodyText:
Made some small changes to make tests run successfully on windows. In 3 of the cases the fixes are made in the tests themselves, but in one case I had to change a method (JSONResponse#createResponse()) to make the writer explicitly use utf-8, which I don't believe should cause any troubles.
Fixes #1601
Signed-off-by: Anders Alfredsson andersb86@gmail.com

commit.message:
Fix tests failing on windows

Signed-off-by: Anders Alfredsson <andersb86@gmail.com>
